description:
It`s New Year`s Day, and Renge is admiring the kadomatsu decoration in front of her house. She checks the mailbox and finds New Year`s cards inside from everyone at Asahigaoka Branch School, but she seems a bit disappointed for some reason. Then, when she takes the cards inside to show her family, she sees her sister Hikage frantically begging Kazuho for a New Year`s allowance...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Got Cold and Then Hot
寒くなったりあったかくなったりした
